DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether supplement 25-hydroxyvitamin D five-times potent raise vitamin D status ( reflect serum 25 ( OH ) D ) compare equivalent amount vitamin D3 old adult . It entail 10 week supplementation study winter month .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Supplementation With 25-hydroxyvitamin D3 Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The UK ( McCance & Widdowson ) food composition table suggest 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( present food , albeit low concentration , also commercially available ) may possess 5-times activity native vitamin D3 food . Thus , theory , micogram 25-hydroxyvitamin D consume diet could boost vitamin D status five time effectively compare microgram native vitamin D food . It worth note , however , estimate potency range 2 5 , depend approach use , real potency need confirm human study . This study aim examine biological activity 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( i.e. , potency relative vitamin D3 ) well effect select functional marker randomise , double-blind , human intervention trial old adult .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible 45+ year age Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1930 hypercalcaemia chronic illness renal liver disorder take medication might interact vitamin D metabolite drink > 21 standard ( male ) / 14 standard ( female ) alcohol per week planning change smoking habit
